column3: Impairments and other charges are as follows:-For the year ended December 31, 2019, amount includes approximately $1.6 billion attributable to Completion and Production, $849 million attributable to Drilling and Evaluation, and $56 million attributable to Corporate and other.-For the years ended December 31, 2018 and December 31, 2017, we recorded aggregate charges of $265 million and $647 million, respectively, to write-down our investment in Venezuela.
